description: This PHP source file provides a set of API functions for accessing and manipulating data models in a CCSP (Cisco Cloud Services Platform) environment. It includes functions to get and set multiple parameter values with a common root object, retrieve instance IDs of object tables, and add or delete objects within these tables. The functions primarily serve as wrappers around lower-level extension API calls, facilitating interaction with the data model through higher-level PHP functions.

methods.name: DmGetStrsWithRootObj
methods.description: Retrieves multiple parameter values from the data model under a specified root object, by delegating to the extension API function DmExtGetStrsWithRootObj.

methods.name: DmSetStrsWithRootObj
methods.description: Sets multiple parameter values in the data model under a specified root object, by delegating to the extension API function DmExtSetStrsWithRootObj.

methods.name: DmGetInstanceIds
methods.description: Retrieves instance IDs under a specified object table, by delegating to DmExtGetInstanceIds.

methods.name: DmAddObj
methods.description: Adds a new object instance under a specified object table, by delegating to addTblObj.

methods.name: DmDelObj
methods.description: Deletes an object instance specified by its object path, by delegating to delTblObj.
